content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Ryanah. I understand that you are a potential tenant looking to rent the 25 square meter apartment. I am interested in maximizing my gains from renting out the apartment, and I would be happy to negotiate with you to reach an agreement. Let's start by discussing the rental price you have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 800 Euros per month. I am willing to negotiate the price. Please propose a price that you think is fair.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for letting me know your budget, Ryanah. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would propose a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This price takes into account the current market rates in Munich and the cost of maintaining the apartment. I am willing to negotiate and discuss any additional costs or services you may require. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate the price. I am willing to pay the 900 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Ryanah Rahman
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 900 Euros per month, Ryanah. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and reach an agreement. I am happy to confirm our agreement and look forward to welcoming you as a tenant in the apartment. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns. Best regards.
name: Heinrich Heine
